welcome to the AWS report I'm Jeff bar
my guest today is Kate matadera CTO of
decide.com Welcome Kate Hi Jeff it's
great to be here so let's talk about
what decide.com is all about so we are
in Next Generation consumer shopping
experience so we use data from all over
the web to help consumers decide what to
buy and when to buy so we use algorithms
and data to help predict if prices are
going to go down if new models will come
out of products and also you know if
you're thinking about buying something
what a review might be and how products
in that line have trended around Brands
and things like that okay so I was
looking at the site and there's a number
of different product categories so I was
able to select a category and I I was
looking at video projectors and I saw
that there's some really nice and
expensive video projectors I can then
choose that I can say this is the
pricing history this is when it was
obsolet and so forth where does that all
that data come from so we collect it
from everywhere all over the web and we
have you know terabytes of data going
back around pricing data product data
specs manufacturers so we have thousands
of sellers that we list on our site um
both local and online so you pull in all
this data you get various data sources
data feeds and so forth bring it all in
process it and then present it to the
user exactly and we do so both with our
web experience and we have a mobile app
as well both on Android and iPhone Okay
now what's the technology behind the
scenes so we're all in with AWS awesome
uh but we do have um obviously we're
doing machine learning and data mining
so we extensively use EMR to do some of
that um behind the scenes you know we're
a really standard kind of service based
architecture and so we have Services
powering the data which is largely
loaded from Flat files in S3 and then
the clients serve the data from those so
as a startup how does AWS help you well
with us we're constantly developing new
algorithms and different hypothesis
around you know improving our
predictions and improving you know the
data that and the way we show it to
Consumers so adob us allows us to just
use the parts that are important so we
can say oh we want to test these five
things and we can do it all at once in
parallel and then turn it off and we
only pay for what we use so you know we
were worried about burn rate or
something like that we could just stop
using it which wouldn't be the case with
traditional hosting so where do you see
things going in the next let's say six
months or so with the product Oh I'm I'm
super excited because we're we're really
doing a lot of stuff around what to buy
and you know if you can think about it
kind of as the next generation of
consumer reports you know right there
they have experts looking at products
but we're able to take all these expert
reviews and look at these expert reviews
over time and I mean just think about it
if you were to go buy a new dishwasher
tomorrow do you care about the reviews
on that dishwasher you sort of do but
what you really want to know is how is
this manufacturer done the Last 5 Years
and even better if we can extract it out
and say oh you know what this dishwasher
will have a problem with the door
because the last four models in this
line potentially have so you should be
aware of that all right well it sounds
great so I really appreciate you're
taking the time to come by and and speak
with us today yeah I'm excited to be
here thanks again wish you lots of luck
with this in in the future this has been
the AWS report and I'm Jeff bar
